agenda.description: ** REVISION ** SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Nominations TIME & DATE: 11:00 AM or upon adjournment/recess Thursday, May 2, 2019 PLACE: Senator Buckingham's Desk CHAIR: Senator Dawn Buckingham __________________________________________________________________________________ To consider the following: Discussion and action on pending business from the Thursday, April 25, 2019, meeting, as well as, the posted agenda. Public testimony on the non-appearing Nominees will be taken at the Thursday, May 9, 2019, meeting. The following nominees will not appear: Advisory Committee to the Texas Board of Criminal Justice on Offenders with Medical or Mental Impairments Sanjay G. Adhia Appointed 04-11-19 for a Huffman Fort Bend County term to expire 02-01-21 Robb David Catalano Appointed 04-11-19 for a Powell Tarrant County term to expire 02-01-25 James B. Eby Appointed 04-11-19 for a Fallon Wichita County term to expire 02-01-25 Trenton R. Marshall Appointed 04-11-19 for a Powell Tarrant County term to expire 02-01-25 Denise Oncken Appointed 04-11-19 for a Bettencourt Harris County term to expire 02-01-21 Rogelio Cesar Rodriguez Appointed 04-11-19 for a Rodríguez El Paso County term to expire 02-01-21 Yolanda N. Waters Appointed 04-11-19 for a Taylor Galveston County term to expire 02-01-23 Cameron County Regional Mobility Authority Frank Parker Appointed 04-23-19 for a Lucio Cameron County term to expire 02-01-20 Camino Real Regional Mobility Authority Joyce A. Hyde Appointed 04-24-19 for a Johnson Dallas County term to expire 02-01-25 Stacie Dieb McDavid Appointed 04-24-19 for a Nelson Tarrant County term to expire 02-01-25 Mary Pincoffs Wilson Appointed 04-24-19 for a Watson Travis County term to expire 02-01-25 Veterans' Land Board Gerald Judson Scott Appointed 04-16-19 for a Buckingham Travis County term to expire 12-29-22 __________________________________________________________________________________ ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions of the schedule **
